title: Virginia Is Revamping Its Vaccine Pre-Registration Process. D.C. Isn't Far Behind
description: On Tuesday, Virginia will roll out a statewide pre-registration portal, supplanting registration systems set up by local health districts.
cleaned_text: This website uses cookies so that we can provide you with the best user experience possible.
